Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Engineering Force Workshop'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Within the space permeated by the scent of oil and metal, an incongruous figure occupies the desk that originally belonged to the captain of the Engineering Force.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: "Commandant Vanessa, here's your water.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'A member of the Engineering Force respectfully extends a glass of ice water to Vanessa. However, she refrains from reaching for it, opting instead to pinch her nose with a handkerchief, seemingly unable to tolerate the pungent smell here.'}
{3: "Even without speaking, Vanessa's presence spikes tension among everyone present, making it even more agonizing than watching Karenina argue with Teddy."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: "Uh, Commandant Vanessa, you really don't need to keep waiting here... and that's Captain's—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Oh? How unwelcoming! The Engineering Force can't even spare a moment to attend to a guest?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Or is it that I'm being an eyesore to you and affecting your work efficiency?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: "That's certainly not it... It's just rare to see a client come to our workshop to oversee the working progress in person...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'I have a lot of free time right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Besides, this is for my most cherished toy. Why wouldn't I keep a close eye on it?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "The previous short-range drone didn't meet my standards in either flight distance or weight distribution. Your captain had promised me that it would only take two weeks to make the improvements I wanted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: 'We totally understand. Our designers are working diligently on it...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'For the next fifteen minutes, the atmosphere remains unchanged with tension still lingering in the air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: 'Vice-Captain... what do we do now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A Construct whispers to Teddy, who is quietly typing before a terminal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Engineering Force Member', 3: 'But if Captain comes back and sees her seat...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Wouldn't that be perfect? You're all probably sick of watching me and Karenina argue. So why not switch things up a bit?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: "Just leave her be. Don't bother me unless it's important. I'm busy.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "You're the vice-captain of the Engineering Force? The Norman girl?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Clack!'}
{3: "That's the sound of Teddy forcefully pressing the enter key on the keyboard."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Why do you have to poke your nose around the Engineering Force? Shouldn't a Task Force commandant like you be minding your own Constructs?", 4: '1'}
{3: "As Vanessa approaches her, Teddy's previously indifferent tone becomes noticeably impatient."}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "There's no rule against outsiders here, and technically speaking, I can't really be considered one either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'The equipment the Task Force requested is intended for surface combat, so overseeing your work falls squarely within my responsibilities as your "client."', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh, really? I was just thinking those sparks from welding might mess up that pretty face of yours. We can't afford the blame for damaging the image of an elite squad's commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Oh, my bad. I guess that's no longer a concern because Egret got booted off the elite squad list for failing to recruit three members in such a long time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Heh, so your name's Teddy, right? Since you seem so curious about the current state of Egret, I wouldn't mind having you as my reserve member.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Compared to hanging around the Engineering Force, my squad will definitely make you feel more at home.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Thanks, but no thanks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "And please, do me a favor and behave. Otherwise, I'll have to make you leave on behalf of my hot-headed captain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'What are you up to?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Oh? Are you interested in programming? Want me to teach you how to count in binary?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "It's just that I can tell you're not doing what the Engineering Force is supposed to.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Listen, your request is more like one of those things we'd use for evaluating interns in the Engineering Force, not something I need to worry about.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "What I'm working on also isn't your—", 4: '1'}
{3: "Teddy's typing comes to an abrupt halt, and the words she was about to utter are held back."}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm coding software patches for Hamlet's second-gen model for the WGAA. Their tech team was drowning in work, practically begging me for help, so I had no choice but to step in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Took the opportunity to squeeze some funds out of them. That's how we managed to get the lightweight carbon steel for your little drone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Hamlet... That does ring a bell. I remember that for a while, 【kuroname】 was often seen hanging out with those WGAA people.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'I think I heard about Hamlet from that person back then.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hamlet is a holographic theatre simulation device. I recall that the WGAA specifically sought 【kuroname】 for assistance with the development of the subsequent model.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Who knows? I mean, that person is a "Chief", right? Must have some special talent that a regular commandant can only dream of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Heh, don't you think it comes out a failure when the irony is too blatant?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'So, is it really a failure?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "My judgment was spot on, I must say. I'm more and more inclined to have you join Egret.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "It's not like I mind it, but I can't guarantee that a certain someone's Blast Hammer would be on board with your request.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "But the WGAA seeking 【kuroname】's help only proves that those art people have no eye for talent.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Let me guess. Your next line is going to be, "I have to go and correct their perspective," right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'So? Why not?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'I happen to have a lot of free time right now.', 4: '2'}
